item.title: New C++ Log
item.author: hipersuperultra
item.content:
I have a new ‘blog’ where I write about the Udacity C++ course I’m in.

I know basically nothing about C++. Used it a few times on some projects when I was undergrad. However, the language always inspired-me.

Few months ago, Udacity started a C++ nanodegree program and I decided to (buy) join. Silly me, I’m not doing ok on it and I’m completelly under the schedule on it. I want the certification and I have not much time left to complete it.

I use to make good progress when I focus and think about it everytime so I think that to write about my progress would help me succeed.

Will I?

Well, let’s see here hipersuperultra’s cpp log

item.title: Post of Intent
item.author: hipersuperultra
item.content:
Another night asleep, another project starting out of the blue.

Today I was reading something about procrastination (http://www.structuredprocrastination.com/) and I found out, thinking with myself, that, maybe, some of my greatest projects were born out of procrastination moments. Ok, let’s keep it going. Better than to have no side projects.

Well, the intent of this one here is to keep track of what I’m doing, learning, studing about programming nowadays. That’s it.
